chara.textHome: Victory should be won fair and square.

So, I didn't wish to win games or
anything like that.

Besides, cheating to win is just plain boring.
Hours and hours of practice is what make
the difference on the field...
Nothing beats it.

Today, tomorrow, whenever,
I'll be practicing full blast!
Can't win without scoring points.

At the end of the day,
being decisive is key.

You could say the same thing
about fighting Witches.
My shots are better than ever!
I gotta keep this up!

Now I can get two, even three,
steps ahead of my opponents...

Ever get hit in the mouth right after kick-off
and they score on you right away?

It happens, so that's why you've gotta
be locked in from the get-go!

You play two 45-minute halves in soccer.
That's a full 90 minutes of staying focused.

It's not easy, so being relaxed before the
match and during time-outs is real important.
Yo! Let's get started.
Huh?
Oops, sorry.

I forgot to tell you what we're doing. 
Will you count how many reps I can do?
Please!
Morning!
Oh, me?
I just had morning practice, I'm starving.
At times like these, I crave a huge meal!
Yeahhh...

I always get so sleepy around this time!
 Really, really sleepy...

Between being worn out from practice and
full from breakfast, all I wanna do is sleep...
It's time for some serious soccer practice!

But I also have to hunt those Witches too...
In any case, this is always a busy
time of the day for me...
*Yawn*

I poured all my energy into soccer and
my Magical Girl work today.
No fooling around, I'm going straight to bed!

The magic of soccer is that it can be
played as long as you have a ball.

It's like this amazing universal language
that lets you make friends with people all
across the world!

The playing field stretches out endlessly
ahead of me,
so I just gotta run to the other side!
All right, blow the whistle!

You're constantly going "1-v-1" 
when playing soccer...

You have to use your own power to break
through, or else you won't be able to get
down the field.

She normally never does, but whenever
Umika gets writer's block, she starts cooking.
It seems to help her get rid of stress.

If I make it onto the national team,
I'll get to compete with people all over
the world, right?

Ooohhh,
just thinking about it gets me pumped up!

I can't change my soccer cleats that easily.
My uniform is just clothes,

but my cleats are a tool.
 If I've gotten used to a pair,
I make sure to take good care of them.
Witches use curses to bring despair...

But us Magical Girls were given the power
to dispell curses and rescue everyone.
We were given hope in the form of magic!

When fighting Witches, I usually keep them
in one spot while Umika attacks them.
That’s when Kazumi deals the finishing blow!

I'm confident when it comes to
my power and speed.

When I fight I like to get right up
on my opponent!
That's my foolproof strategy.

When it comes to having the most broad
range of skills, Umika definitely wins.

She uses my strengths to her advantage
when we fight together.
Battling by her side, it's just so reassuring.
Kazumi is still so unstable.
Umika and I have to keep a close eye on her.
We'll always be by your side, Kazumi...
Kazumi's hair? Oh, uh...
Yeah, Umika and I cut it...
Yep, that was my first time ever cutting hair...
You can tell, huh?
Yeah, kick-off time!
The game's over, fair and square!
This is a big win for us!
What an intense battle!
We won...but there's a lot more work to do.
Hey, I'm Kaoru Maki!

I play soccer, and being the star player on
the national team is my ultimate dream.

Send a good pass my way on the field,
okay?
Sweet! All my practicing is paying off!
That should about do it!
I feel light as a feather!
Finally!
It's time for the next kick off!

The basics of soccer all come down
to stopping and kicking.
It sounds easy, but there's a lot to it...

Explaining will take forever,
so let's just play sometime!

In the middle of a match, there's no time
to think about your next move.

You've gotta feel it. That's why we practice
the same thing over and over.
That's how you reach the goal.
